mapper.select: SELECT p.*, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(pt.ptag_id, ":", t.name) ORDER BY pt.ptag_id ASC SEPARATOR ',') AS tags, COUNT(DISTINCT fu.user_id) AS real_follower, (COUNT(DISTINCT fu.user_id) + p.fake_follower) AS total_follower FROM performer p LEFT JOIN performer_ptag pt ON p.id = pt.performer_id LEFT JOIN ptag t ON pt.ptag_id = t.id LEFT JOIN performer_user fu ON fu.performer_id = p.id WHERE fu.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY p.id
